title: Autofill.
body:
So its a pretty good consensus that we all hate autofill to atleast some degree, be it you are challenger and can play every role you still get a little pissed that you cant play your main.

or you are bronze and are just honestly pissed weather you got autofill or a teammate gets autofill because doesnt matter who gets it someone is going to feed or troll.

so how about an incentive to you know, actually play out your autofill game and win aside from autofill protection.

Namely just throw a couple extra lp their way if they win, i mean, its only fair they did just win on a role they dont normally play, therefore have shown they are at least a tiny bit more well rounded than other people in their elo.

Just a thought.

Sincerely, someone who usually wins their autofill games and is salty that the only reward i get is yelling at my team for the next two games while i try to make the most of no autofill.

replies.body:
I made a thread about autofill https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/mTZAAFYG-autofill but someone has either hidden or moved the thread because it doesn't show up in the thread list

They need to give punishments to people who dodge if they are autofilled. It would be extremely easy to implement, if the person wasn't autofilled and they dodge the penalty remains as it is. If the person was autofilled and they dodge they get a much more severe penalty.

And the second thing they need to do is queue dodges should never count towards your 2 games auto fill protection. As you can see in my thread I've now had 4 days in a row without a single game where I wasn't autofilled. Because when I get my lane the autofilled person dodges, then I get my lane again and again the autofilled person dodges. Then the game removes autofill protection because it counts those 2 dodged queues as my autofill protected games. Then next game I get autofilled. I played 5 games today, all 5 were autofilled. This has happened to me repeatedly for 4 days straight
A reward for it may be a good idea. Not sure about the bonus LP thiugh... Possibly more IP would be considered, bonus LP would not be considered by riot IMO.

The issue is the lp actually makes sense, LP is meant to be an approximation of your skill, and you just won a match that supposedly was harder than your average game thus requiring more skill.

Hell getting the same LP as a normal game is kind of a kick in the teeth. Like in its current iteration all autofill manages to do is slow down peoples climbs because on average every 10 games you will be autofilled twice.

So 2 of your 10 games you will have a much lower chance of winning.

Which makes it so that if you have an average winrate below 63% the odds are stacked against you

I say 63% because if you win 63% of the 8 games that werent autofilled you will have won 5 games and lost 3.

At that point if you win both your autofilled games you will have a 70% winrate, if you lose both your autofill games you will have a 50% winrate.

In otherwords autofill makes it so you have to win 13% more games on average just to maintain a 50% winrate assuming you always lose your autofilled games due to your autofilled roles being played to a much lower level than your main roles.

Yet there are no systems in place to mitigate that inherent LP decline in the design.
